Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: sighting detailsmy family and i were eating at our local wendy's. we always sit in the same location. i sit looking out the window in a southern direction. i looked up into the sky and i noticed a strange looking cloud. the cloud changed from white\grey to a green and then purple color in a matter of seconds. i told my son (15) to look at it. he turned and when he did an oval shaped object flew out of the cloud. it travelled very fast. suddenly it stopped and hovered in place. it was shining very bright with the sun setting. it appeared higher than planes fly but very large. after about a minute it flew to the west very fast and vanished.
Summary: Large Oval object exits cloud, cloud changes color and object flies off.
trends: There have been 24 other sightings in North Myrtle Beach
There were no other sightings in North Myrtle Beach on or around February 13th 2009
